metadata.title: CVE-2018-14473 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OCS Inventory 2.4.1 lacks a proper XML parsing configuration, allowing the use of external entities. This issue can be exploited by an attacker sending a crafted HTTP request in order to exfiltrate information or cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5+dfsg-1').
